name: Dirty Bumper Demo
description:
love2d game

arrow keys to move

z/x/enter to do other things

you can get a few quests done but the dungeon area never got finished

quest progression:

talk to the mom in town

level up, equip cut, talk to the boy in the cave behind a bush

talk to the mom in town again, get something

rescue a man in a cave, get something else, etc
